text: A transgender man is looking to get his chest fixed in the hopes of improving his relationship with his longtime boyfriend. In a clip from Wednesday night's season finale of the E! reality series Botched, Luke admits that he is jealous of his transgender partner Evan's chest because his own surgery ended with disastrous results.'Being transgender in the world today is easier than it's ever been, but it's still more difficult than you can ever understand,'he explains. Scroll down for video Last chance : Luke, who was born a woman, wants his chest fixed once and for all after his surgery to remove his breasts ended with disastrous results Envy : Luke admits that he his jealous of his transgender partner Evan's chest ( pictured ) post - surgery The couple has been together for seven years, and Evan accompanied Luke
